archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.1.6f: f) fail secure (e.g. in the event of a system failure, information is not accessible to unauthorised individuals, remains available to authorised individuals and cannot be tampered with or modified)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
